name: Underwater (itch) (CoolCat7)
description:
A game for Weekly Game Jam - Week 213.

Theme: Submerged.

Are you ready for submerged adventures? You must controlling submarine to avoid obstacles like angry sharks.

Input: 

-Mouse Click changes direction of submarine (up/down).

-Esc opens menu.

Credits:

Music from https://pixabay.com/ru/music/-inspirational-exciting-piano-background-music-for-...

Background from https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/ocean-sea-underwater-background-empty-bottom...
